articles.description: Mask-ne is very much like acne mechanica. Wearing a facial mask can create the ideal environment for acne mechanica to form as the warm moist air is trapped under the mask and the friction can cause clogged pores and breakouts. Here's what you need to know.
articles.content:
So what exactly is mask-ne and why am I getting it?
Mask-ne is very much like acne mechanica, explains Zoe Devine, a Skinstitut Expert. Its the result of environmental factors that are exacerbated b… [+2251 chars]

articles.author: Christopher Knaus
articles.title: Facebook claims it does not conduct business in Australia in Cambridge Analytica appeal - The Guardian
articles.description: Social media company aims to avoid liability over Cambridge Analytica scandal by arguing it does not collect or hold data in Australia
articles.content:
Facebook is claiming it does not conduct business in Australia and does not collect and hold data in the country in its effort to avoid liability over the Cambridge Analytica scandal.
